I just downloaded the junit3.8.1.  I followed the instructions such as
setting the classpath to C:\QA\junit3.8.1\junit.jar.  But when I tried
to test the installation by using either the batch or the graphical
TestRunner tool to run the tests that came with the release, I get this:
Class not found "junit.samples.AllTests"

I am positive that I don't have a junit.jar in my jdk ext. directory.
 Please tell me what to do.  Thanks!

Noel
